title: Not hitting on anyone, just tired of the adrenaline filled sausage party
body: Would any girl gamers like to duo for ranked or norms, legit tired of guys and their tilting. Just want to play with some one for fun and still doing decent. I'm 18 FYI, so preferably players 17+

replies.body: You seem to be assuming a whole lot unless you are on coms with your 5s group.  If you are on coms why do it if it annoys you?

I invite people to discord like my ADC to help better communication, but one wrong move and they act like the game is over. Or they are just ego maniacs in bronze 5 but they are the best yasuo main on earth
